# Kingdom of Garahun

|event_start=|date_start=|year_start=|event_end=|date_event3=|date_end=|year_exile_start=|year_exile_end=|event1=|date_event1=|event2=|date_event2=|event3=|common_name=Garahun|conventional_long_name=Kingdom of Garahun|date_post=|p1=|date_event5=|event6=|date_event6=|event_pre=|date_pre=|event_post=|date_event4=|event4=|flag_p1=|image_p1=|s1=Kingdom of Nepal|flag_s1=Flag of Nepal.svg|image_s1=|year_representative1=|event5=|today=Nepal}}
The Kingdom of Garahun () was a petty kingdom in the confederation of 24 states known as Chaubisi Rajya.
